name: Maze Ninja
description:
With Maze Ninja, you become the hero!
Navigate difficult mazes while slaying monsters that try to stop in your tracks. Sounds easy? Prove it!
Maze Ninja features a variety of beautiful mazes and atmospheric soundtracks that will unleash your inner Ninja! The Maze levels become more difficult the higher you level up so the challenge never ends.
Can you beat all the mazes and become the true Maze Ninja?

Survive the Monsters!

In Maze Ninja, the Monsters are out to get you! Not only do you have to find the Maze's exit as fast as you can, but you also have to fight enemies. Some enemies might grant a small heal when you kill them, thus a brawl might be worth it.

Can you beat level 100?

Maze Ninja starts off with simple Mazes but gradually increases in size and difficulty. Beating Level 100 is incredibly difficult, let alone beating it with a good score. Only true Maze Ninjas are up to the task!

Find the Flag!

Beating a Level requires finding the Flag, however you don't know where it's located! Many levels require you to memorize paths in order to achieve the high score and become the ultimate Maze Ninja!Features:
  • 100 difficult levels are waiting for you to beat them
  • No time limit!
  • Find the goal-flag as fast as you can, but survive the monsters that are out to stop you!
  • Some monsters can heal you if you slay them
  • Relax to atmospheric Asian-style music tracks!
